name: IELTS Reading
description: Are you preparing for IELTS READING? Searching an app with a real test like collection of exam samples? Searching useful IELTS READING exercises, materials, tips? Then this app is for you. IELTS Reading app provides real reading tasks and model practice tests with answers, and covers the following reading types:  multiple choice True/false/not given short-answer questions sentence completion notes, summary, plan, diagram, table or chart completion classification matching paragraphs
